stimulusHtml: National sovereignty is weakened the most by international organizations in which of the following countries?
choicesHtml: Nigeria, because of the power of the Peace and Security Council of the African Union (AU)
Russia, because of the power of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO)-Russia Council
Mexico, because of the power of the Secretariat of the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
Great Britain, because of the power of the Court of Justice of the European Union (EU)
Iran, because of the power of the Secretary General of the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC)
